bill.summary: 1/21/1987--Introduced. Provides that the pay increase for Members of Congress recommended by the President on January 5, 1987, pursuant to the Federal Salary Act of 1967 be made contingent on meeting the deficit-reduction requirements of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act) for FY 1988 and 1989.
